entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
